Preface
Although everything contained in this package is mathematically trivial, the author thinks that having available a nice and easy-to-use implementation of residue classes as sets which permits forming unions, intersections and differences and smoothly interacts with finite sets of elements w.r.t. these operations is often useful. This package is crucially needed by the &RCWA; package, which introduces groups acting on sets of unions of residue classes -- in fact, the code of this package was originally written for &RCWA;.
